hero.title: Optimize your crops with Artificial Intelligence
hero.description: AgrIA helps you meet CAP subsidy requirements by analyzing your satellite images.

about.title: About AgrIA
about.paragraph1Part2: is an integrated image analysis and intelligent chat tool,
about.paragraph1Bold2: specializing in agricultural satellite image classification
about.paragraph1Part3: Designed for farmers and landowners, it facilitates crop valuation and
about.paragraph1Bold3: provides a report that helps them qualify for various European Union eco-scheme aids within the framework of the Common Agricultural Policy (CAP).
about.paragraph2Bold1: open the Parcel Finder, enter the cadastral reference, and confirm the displayed property.
about.paragraph2Part2: AgrIA will open the chat and provide an image analysis, along with recommendations to comply with CAP eco-scheme eligibility regulations. You can also
about.paragraph2Bold2: upload your own image from the chat, but AgrIA will not have access to the SIGPAC information obtained by using the cadastral reference

parcelLocation.title: Parcel Location
parcelLocation.description: Automatically find your parcel by simply using its cadastral reference.

satelliteImageAnalysis.title: Satellite Image Analysis
satelliteImageAnalysis.description: Get an accurate description of your fields from Sentinel satellite images for a detailed view of the terrain.

resourceAnalysis.title: Resource Analysis
resourceAnalysis.description: Receive personalized recommendations for efficient space utilization, crop species, and other resources.

pacAdvisory.title: CAP Advisory
pacAdvisory.description: Get expert guidance to meet Common Agricultural Policy subsidy criteria.

interactiveSupport.title: Interactive Support
interactiveSupport.description: Interact with AgrIA through chat and receive updated answers about your crops.

quickstart.title: Get Started with AgrIA: Parcel Finder
quickstart.paragraph1: In order to exploit AgrIA's full potential,
quickstart.paragraphBold: you will need to access the Parcel Finder.

steps.2: Introduce the cadastral reference code of your parcel or state.
steps.3: Select the date you want the image from.
steps.4: Press 'Find Parcel' and wait for the system to retrieve your parcel image.
steps.5: Confirm your parcel image to pass it to AgrIA's chat along with the SIGPAC classification information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Do you have any questions or need more information? Feel free to contact us.

parcelFinder.description1: Enter the cadastral reference code of the parcel you want to query. If you don't know it, you can search for it on the cadastre website or related property documents.
parcelFinder.description2: Make sure the code has 20 characters.
parcelFinder.description3Bold: Urban cadastral reference codes will not be accepted.
parcelFinder.description3: If you have difficulty finding your parcel, upload an image of your farm to the chat along with crop data and parcel area.

description.bold1: Draw your parcel's limits over the map.
description.normal1: When you are done marking your parcel,
description.bold2: press again on the initial node to finish
description.normal3: In order to get a better evaluation and classification from AgrIA,
description.bold3: make sure you provide your parcel's crop classifcation.
description.normal4: For that, you may use the SIGAPC classification form below the map.

coordinates.label: Parcel's coordinates
coordinates.invalid:
Invalid coordinates format. Please use the 'latitude, longitude' format.
Input coordinates:

description.bold1: Use the following form to indicate all of your states's crop types.
description.normal1: These follow SIGPAC classification. Pertinent information should be available at SIGPAC's website or property-related documents.
description.bold2: Use the following table to indicate the total surface taken by each crop type,
description.normal2: even if it may be shared among different parcels.

uploadImage.title: Image
uploadImage.description: Here will be displayed the description generated by AgrIA from the uploaded satellite image.

chatWithAgria.title: Chat with AgrIA
chatWithAgria.agriaMessage1: Hello! I'm your Agricultural Image Assistant, but you can call me AgrIA! My purpose here is to analyze satellite images of cultivated fields to assist you...
chatWithAgria.userMessage1: Hello AgrIA, I have uploaded an image of my field in parcel 34. Could you analyze water usage?
chatWithAgria.agriaMessage2: Of course, I have analyzed the image of parcel 34. It seems there are areas with a low vegetation index that could indicate inefficient water use. I suggest...
chatWithAgria.inputPlaceholder: Write your question or comment here...

chatInput.getSuggestionButtonTitle: Get a suggested prompt from the reply.

progressBar.completed: Process can sometimes take up to 1 minute aprox...
